# Victor Juan Jimenez Flores - Complete Professional Profile

## Overview

Victor Juan Jimenez Flores (also known as Viktor Jimenez) is a Full Stack Developer, Cognitive Developer, and AI Specialist based in Peru. He combines technical expertise in software development with academic credentials in business administration.

## Professional Summary

Victor is a Computer and Systems Engineer from the Universidad Nacional Jorge Basadre Grohmann with solid experience as a Full Stack Developer. He primarily uses Python and Node.js for backend development. His current focus is on Artificial Intelligence technologies, developing chatbots, virtual assistants, and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) architectures for startups.

He holds an MBA and a PhD in Administration, which allows him to apply a strategic business vision to software development projects.

## Technical Skills

### Backend & Languages
- Python
- Node.js
- TypeScript
- JavaScript

### Frontend & UI
- Vue.js
- React
- Tailwind CSS
- HTML/CSS

### Artificial Intelligence
- OpenAI API
- LangChain
- RAG Architectures
- Chatbot Development
- Virtual Assistants
- WhatsApp Bots
- Instagram Messenger Bots

### Databases & DevOps
- MongoDB
- PostgreSQL
- MySQL
- Docker
- Git/GitHub

### Frameworks & Stacks
- MEVN Stack (MongoDB, Express, Vue.js, Node.js)
- Express.js
- FastAPI

## Education

### Doctor en Administración (PhD in Administration)
- Institution: Universidad César Vallejo
- Year: 2024

### Master of Business Administration (MBA)
- Institution: Neumann Business School
- Year: 2021

### Ingeniero en Informática y Sistemas (Computer and Systems Engineer)
- Institution: Universidad Nacional Jorge Basadre Grohmann
- Year: 2018

## Research & Academic Work

Victor is a registered researcher in Peru's national research registry:

- Status: RENACYT Researcher
- Research Group: María Rostworowski III - Code P0108504
- Research Area: Artificial Intelligence and Intelligent Software Development

- ORCID: 0000-0002-1034-9447
- CTI Vitae Profile: http://directorio.concytec.gob.pe/appDirectorioCTI/VerDatosInvestigador.do?id_investigador=108504

## Services Offered

### 1:1 Mentoring Sessions
Victor offers personalized 60-minute mentoring sessions covering:
- Web Development (Frontend & Backend)
- Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
- Software Architecture & System Design
- Professional Career Development & Growth

Investment: $33 USD per session

### Development Services
- Custom AI Agent Development
- WhatsApp Bot Development
- Instagram Messenger Bot Development
- Full Stack Web Application Development
- RAG Architecture Implementation
- Chatbot and Virtual Assistant Creation

## Current Focus

Victor is currently specializing in building AI agents for messaging platforms, particularly:
- WhatsApp Business API integrations
- Instagram Messenger automation
- Custom chatbot solutions for businesses
- RAG-based knowledge assistants
